Mnist: The order of the bins in each experiment. Bin i includes examples with label i.
v1 - [6, 2, 1, 8, 3, 0, 5, 7, 9, 4]
v2 - [0, 7, 1, 6, 8, 5, 2, 4, 3, 9]
v3 - [9, 8, 5, 7, 3, 2, 1, 0, 6, 4]

Caltech256: The classes were allocated to 10 bins based on the following orders. 
The first six bins contain 26 classes, in the order they are listed below. Each other bin contain 25 classes.

v1 : [13, 237, 161, 253, 229, 221, 113, 63, 27, 238, 244, 198, 72, 172, 117, 220, 191, 164, 142, 107, 154, 116, 233, 132, 108, 112, 182, 129, 9, 123, 75, 42, 151, 127, 173, 121, 124, 67, 137, 10, 86, 214, 28, 22, 235, 160, 84, 118, 224, 201, 79, 167, 185, 157, 186, 43, 125, 31, 193, 25, 176, 143, 146, 150, 162, 211, 231, 114, 59, 98, 106, 92, 94, 26, 5, 17, 204, 52, 0, 16, 226, 101, 177, 203, 89, 4, 249, 45, 14, 153, 99, 40, 241, 49, 212, 179, 141, 205, 184, 170, 163, 23, 197, 136, 245, 30, 54, 178, 134, 230, 218, 97, 61, 196, 217, 223, 148, 145, 66, 144, 183, 209, 11, 120, 228, 105, 46, 50, 251, 7, 208, 255, 37, 68, 240, 131, 180, 247, 96, 242, 56, 109, 133, 166, 78, 110, 152, 207, 139, 215, 83, 190, 169, 76, 82, 32, 29, 70, 41, 234, 19, 189, 48, 250, 239, 254, 81, 195, 21, 53, 168, 88, 69, 174, 74, 102, 135, 243, 126, 12, 158, 57, 18, 1, 175, 155, 34, 95, 140, 227, 24, 210, 130, 91, 187, 159, 80, 236, 171, 216, 219, 90, 165, 8, 77, 119, 200, 248, 15, 36, 194, 213, 225, 138, 58, 206, 33, 111, 47, 55, 6, 128, 147, 35, 156, 122, 71, 62, 202, 3, 188, 232, 38, 149, 199, 115, 73, 44, 100, 87, 85, 51, 104, 252, 39, 2, 65, 192, 20, 64, 246, 222, 93, 103, 60, 181]

v2 : [68, 33, 117, 208, 20, 245, 118, 204, 0, 21, 201, 177, 37, 18, 248, 24, 16, 168, 246, 81, 45, 234, 141, 6, 195, 91, 222, 158, 162, 69, 244, 157, 163, 40, 23, 232, 236, 212, 185, 49, 53, 121, 205, 165, 55, 30, 50, 197, 110, 51, 127, 254, 4, 196, 58, 189, 88, 148, 52, 73, 160, 154, 225, 83, 188, 174, 133, 82, 47, 135, 179, 186, 140, 26, 145, 181, 126, 90, 104, 44, 54, 5, 241, 113, 235, 150, 142, 93, 34, 151, 29, 132, 74, 176, 224, 66, 72, 39, 19, 155, 22, 119, 200, 184, 46, 211, 15, 13, 251, 218, 233, 149, 230, 84, 114, 70, 217, 77, 255, 136, 183, 202, 125, 111, 252, 10, 87, 152, 129, 209, 173, 107, 161, 175, 223, 56, 80, 99, 42, 17, 61, 249, 101, 109, 96, 131, 62, 167, 171, 75, 139, 59, 63, 231, 169, 14, 95, 229, 35, 153, 48, 159, 220, 100, 216, 199, 60, 108, 65, 103, 28, 89, 1, 147, 8, 166, 124, 71, 2, 12, 112, 41, 120, 27, 228, 219, 137, 92, 76, 9, 128, 144, 98, 64, 172, 194, 214, 170, 203, 180, 221, 7, 238, 187, 32, 105, 36, 192, 94, 86, 237, 210, 3, 190, 206, 78, 226, 193, 25, 122, 67, 85, 242, 143, 115, 215, 138, 240, 198, 146, 134, 191, 57, 178, 253, 38, 97, 247, 250, 106, 123, 79, 243, 227, 43, 182, 207, 11, 156, 116, 164, 213, 239, 31, 130, 102]
